name: scrappy granny
notes:
one more way to use those leftover bits of sock yarn- this scrappy granny square works up quickly. make one {coaster} or hundreds {king-size bed spread}. the creative power is in your hooky hands!

8-10 grams on a size d hook creates a 4.5 inch square- *results may vary.*

**pattern includes instructions for one granny square. does not include how to join squares for a blanket.**

pattern was written for simplicity and therefore does not include a legend for abbreviations. all abbreviations are in standard us crochet terms.

you can now find the **blog post with photo tutorial** [here][1] and a **full video tutorial** [here][2].


  [1]: https://knittynatty.com/2018/12/12/scrappy-granny-photo-tutorial/
  [2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu2qffaudra
